timeline.message:
Removes the ID as default exported field.

However, if requested as column, it still can be exported. Keeping the ID in every export is
kind of dangerous as if present, this is the preferred way of synchronizing entities. Therefore
this prohibits and export and then import on different systems (as the IDs will most probably
not match).

Adds a method to iterate over all known physical objects in a space.

This is mostly intended for maintenance or debugging tasks as especially for
S3 compatible stores this is a very inefficient operation.

Makes flushing events in dev systems more eagerly.

We now flush events after 10s instead of 5min.
